options: ['she loves children', 'Dick is studying in the school', 'she wants the students to remember her', "she doesn't like the pictures any more"]
questions: Why does the old woman give her pictures to a school? Because   _  .
article:
Dick's grandmother is very rich . She has many shops. The old woman begins to learn drawing when she is sixty years old. And she loves it very much. She draws a lot of pictures for twelve years.
One day, the old woman is ill. She stays in hospital. Before she dies, she says to Dick," I want to give my picture to a school. Then the students will remember me forever . But I don't know which school I'll give them to. Can you help me?"
"Well" says Dick," You can give them to a blind   school!"
